title: $66+ Airfare Sale from American
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $66+ Airfare Sale from American $66+ Airfare Sale from American August 10, 2015 7:53pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
American Airlines has posted a huge sale discounting nearly 3,500 U.S. routes—all good for flights as far as into winter 2016. American's sale fares start at $131 round-trip, as is displayed on the fares chart below; or broken down to one-way, $65.50 (rounded up to $66 in this deal report's headline). 
Flights must be booked by 11:59 p.m. CT on August 13, and are applicable to travel any day during August 25 - February 10 except on Fridays, Sundays, September 7; November 24, 25; November ... more 
American Airlines has posted a huge sale discounting nearly 3,500 U.S. routes—all good for flights as far as into winter 2016. American's sale fares start at $131 round-trip, as is displayed on the fares chart below; or broken down to one-way, $65.50 (rounded up to $66 in this deal report's headline). 
Flights must be booked by 11:59 p.m. CT on August 13, and are applicable to travel any day during August 25 - February 10 except on Fridays, Sundays, September 7; November 24, 25; November 28 - 30; December 26 - 28; or January 2, 3. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: The best prices were found for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find these promotions on American 's sale page. Pros: Valid for travel all the way into Feb. 2016. Cons:
